description: A list of conditions where one must be met in order to ask this question. (Logical OR)

items.description: All specified properties must be met in order to evaluate the entire condition as true. (Logical AND)

osm_tags.description: A key value map of OSM tags that define that osm feature.

additionalProperties.description: If this is set to a boolean the corresponding osm tag either needs to exist or not independent of its value. An array means one of the given values must match the tag value.

osm_element.description: A single OSM element or list of elements. An array means one of the given elements must match.
